programme.title: Voetbal Geeft
programme.desc: De 32-jarige Jeen heeft een verstandelijke beperking en werkt bij de dagbesteding bij sc Heerenveen. Daar ontwikkelt hij zich, werkt hij superhard en bezorgt hij iedereen altijd een lach op het gezicht. Daarom bezorgen zij Jeen nu een onvergetelijke dag en mag hij als vierde doelman meetrainen met Andries Noppert en de hele Heerenveen-selectie.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: FC Groningen komt eind 2004 met een Noorse spits op de proppen: Erik Nevland. Een tot dan toe onbekende naam bij de Trots van het Noorden die overkomt van het Noorse Viking Stavanger. Vanaf zijn entree maakt Nevland indruk op de Groningers.

programme.title: Keuken Kampioen Divisie Hoogtepunten
programme.desc: Samenvatting van de wedstrijd Jong AZ - Jong PSV uit de 33e speelronde van de Keuken Kampioen Divisie.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Ben van Bilzen is al meer dan vijftig jaar dé materiaalman van NAC Breda en misschien wel een van de bekendste gezichten van de club. In zijn washok, dat er inmiddels uitziet als een echt museum, heeft hij bijna elke speler over de vloer gehad. Terwijl de voetbalwereld razendsnel verandert en spelers komen en gaan, blijft Ben de onvermoeibare, stille kracht achter de club.

In zijn washok, dat er inmiddels uitziet als een echt museum, heeft hij bijna elke speler over de vloer gehad. Terwijl de voetbalwereld razendsnel verandert en spelers komen en gaan, blijft Ben de onvermoeibare, stille kracht achter de club.

programme.desc: 19a g. - La nuova Lega di golf fondata da TMRW Sports di Tiger Woods e Rory McIlroy, in collaborazione con il PGA Tour.

programme.title: Team Cup 3a Giornata
programme.desc: Team Cup 3a g. - Tutti i tornei del tour europeo, il DP World Tour, che assegnano i punti per la 'Race to Dubai'.

programme.title: Qatar Masters 4a Giornata
programme.desc: Qatar Masters 4a g. - Tutti i tornei del tour europeo, il DP World Tour, che assegnano i punti per la 'Race to Dubai'.

programme.title: Giornata finale
programme.desc: 4a g. - Spieth e' al comando con uno score di tre sotto il par ha un colpo di vantaggio su Kaufman (-2) e due su Langer (-1) e Matsuyama (-1). Montepremi del torneo e' di 10.500.000.

programme.title: Giornata finale
programme.desc: Giornata finale - Francesco Molinari e Matteo Manassero alla 77a edizione dell'Augusta Masters. Sul campo dell'Augusta National, in Georgia, Stati Uniti, ci si sfida per conquistare la giacchetta verde.

programme.title: The Masters Official Film
programme.desc: 2021 - Il racconto dell'edizione 2021 del piu' affascinante torneo di golf con il sorprendente Hideki Matsuyama, primo giapponese a vincere una Major conquistando la prestigiosa green jacket.

programme.title: The Masters
programme.desc: 4a g. - Sul campo dell'Augusta National si gioca l'86esima edizioni del Masters, il primo major della stagione. Guido Migliozzi e Francesco Molinari i due azzurri in gara. Difende il titolo Hideki Matsuyama.

programme.title: Giornata finale
programme.desc: 4a g. - Con il record per il minor numero di colpi dopo i primi giri il numero 1 del mondo Dustin Johnson guida la classifica con 4 colpi di vantaggio. TC: Gallerani-Grappasoni-Scarpa.

programme.title: The Masters Official Film
programme.desc: 2015 - Riviviamo tutte le emozioni dell'edizione 2015 del Masters di Golf, sullo storico percorso dell'Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia.

programme.title: The Masters Official Film
programme.desc: 2018 - Riviviamo tutte le emozioni dell'edizione 2018 del Masters di Golf, sullo storico percorso dell'Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia.

programme.title: The Masters Official Film
programme.desc: 2017 - Riviviamo tutte le emozioni dell'edizione 2017 del Masters di Golf, sullo storico percorso dell'Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia.

programme.title: The Masters Official Film
programme.desc: 2014 - Un'ora delle piu' belle immagini dall'Augusta National con il duello finale tra Jordan Spieth e Bubba Watson, che riesce a conquistare per la seconda volta in carriera la green jacket.

programme.title: Giornata finale
programme.desc: Giornata finale - Finalmente conosceremo il nome di chi succedera' a Patrick Reed e, indossando la giacca verde, entrera' nella leggenda. TC: Lupi-Grappassoni-Scarpa-Zappa-Cogliati-Di Ponziano.

programme.title: Giornata finale
programme.desc: 4a g. - Il primo major dell'anno: la 79ma edizione dell'Augusta Masters. Si gioca come ogni anno sullo stesso campo, quello dell'Augusta National in Georgia. Difende la green jacket Bubba Watson.

programme.title: Giornata finale
programme.desc: Giornata finale - Con il record per il minor numero di colpi dopo i primi giri il numero 1 del mondo Dustin Johnson guida la classifica con 4 colpi di vantaggio. TC: Gallerani-Grappasoni-Scarpa.

programme.title: Giornata finale
programme.desc: Giornata finale - I migliori giocatori del mondo nel Masters di Augusta in Georgia. Primo major della stagione. In campo Tiger Woods e Francesco Molinari. Telecronaca: Pomponi-Scarpa-Grappasonni-Zappa.

programme.title: Giornata finale
programme.desc: Giornata finale - L'85esima edizione del Masters Tournament di Augusta (Georgia, USA) apre la stagione dei Major di golf 2021. Nell'edizione dell'anno scorso si impose il n.1 del mondo Dustin Johnson.

programme.title: The Masters Official Film
programme.desc: 2019 - L'83ma edizione del Masters ha visto il ritorno di Tiger Woods che ha indossato la sua quinta "green jacket", in una gara con Francesco Molinari protagonista fino all'ultimo giro.

programme.title: The Masters Official Film

programme.desc: S5 Ep2 - La Gialappa's Band e il Mago Forest tornano con il loro amato show ricco di comici, sketch inediti e ospiti sorprendenti, per una stagione piu' divertente e imprevedibile che mai.

programme.title: Ep. 1
programme.desc: S11 Ep1 - Antonino Cannavacciuolo torna a risolvere problemi in cucina e arriva in Germania, a Rottendorf, per rispondere alla richiesta d'aiuto del ristorante "La dolce Napoli".

programme.title: Ep. 7
programme.desc: S10 Ep7 - A Pavia, in molti ricordano le romantiche cene a lume di candela alla storica trattoria "Ca Bella", un passato glorioso di cui ormai e' rimasto poco o nulla.

programme.title: Ep. 1
programme.desc: S11 Ep1 - Antonino Cannavacciuolo torna a risolvere problemi in cucina e arriva in Germania, a Rottendorf, per rispondere alla richiesta d'aiuto del ristorante "La dolce Napoli".

programme.title: Ep. 5
programme.desc: S12 Ep5 - La quinta tappa vede arrivare un ospite speciale, Elettra Lamborghini. Con la sua bandiera leopardata, porta scompiglio tra le coppie ma anche divertimento.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night
programme.desc: Josh Emmett (19-4-0) goes up against Lerone Murphy (15-0-1) in the featherweight main event; Pat Sabatini (19-5) faces Joanderson Brito (17-4-1) in a featherweight bout; Cortavious Romious (9-3) vs. ChangHo Lee (10-1) in a bantamweight bout.

programme.title: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: Oscar Piastri secured his first win of 2025 with his victory at China over Lando Norris, who leads four-time defending champion Max Verstappen by eight points; Verstappen won the last three races at Japan after averaging 161.271 kph last year.

programme.title: The Bird and Taurasi Show
programme.desc: Defending national champion South Carolina (35-3) seeks its third title in the last four years; UConn (36-3) blew out UCLA, 85-51, to advance to its 13th title game and defeated the Gamecocks, 87-58, on Feb. 16 behind 28 points from Azzi Fudd.

programme.title: MLB Baseball
programme.desc: Miles Mikolas (0-0, 3.38) of St. Louis allowed two hits over 5.1 innings against the Angels; Sean Newcombe (0-1, 9.00) allowed eight hits in four innings at Baltimore in his last start for the Red Sox.

programme.title: UFL Football
programme.desc: Houston (0-1) dropped its opener to St. Louis, 31-6, managing only 170 yards of offense, but defeated the Renegades last season, 17-9; Arlington (1-0) blew out San Antonio, 33-9, behind 110 rushing yards and a touchdown from Kalen Ballage.

programme.title: Baseball Tonight: Sunday Night Countdown
programme.desc: A preview of the upcoming Major League Baseball game with expert analysis, insightful observations and exclusive interviews; coverage includes highlights of Major League Baseball games and the latest baseball news with knowledgeable commentary.

programme.title: Gr8tness
programme.desc: A record once thought to be untouchable, Alex Ovechkin gives an all-access look as he chases the 894 goals of the legendary Wayne Gretzky, showing how he prepares for his games and the pressure he is facing to break the prestigious record.

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Despite losing to NC State in the 1983 NCAA Tournament final, Houston's Phi Slama Jama team, helmed by head coach Guy V. Lewis, was a legendary squad with the likes of Hakeem Olajuwon and Clyde Drexler leading the Cougars to deep tournament runs.

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Christian Laettner used his brash and boisterous personality mixed with his on-court skills to become one of the most despised college basketball athletes in the history of the sport, as the documentary focuses on why he garnered those sentiments.

programme.title: College Softball
programme.desc: Texas entered the series having claimed an 11-1 victory over Missouri in their most recent meeting from the 2023 season behind 3 runs scored by Leighann Goode; four different players had 2 RBIs for the Longhorns in the win at the neutral site.

programme.title: E:60
programme.desc: Behind captain Mark Messier and goalie Mark Richter, the New York Rangers were in prime position in 1994 to give the team their first Stanley Cup title since 1940, using inspiration from paralyzed NYPD officer Steven McDonald to make their run.

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Dave Gavitt, a former basketball coach at Providence, was the driving force behind the creation of the Big East Conference in 1979, which flourished in the 1980s and became one of the most highly respected basketball conferences in the country.

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: In 1983, North Carolina State suffered 10 losses in the regular season and had to overcome national powerhouses to win the ACC Tournament and qualify for the NCAA Tournament, where the Wolfpack mounted a memorable run to the national championship.

programme.title: ESPN Films
programme.desc: Alex Gibney explores the fans' need to place the blame for difficult losses, as he examines the foul ball knocked from Moises Alou's hands by Steve Bartman and the ground ball that rolled through Bill Buckner's legs in the 1986 World Series.

programme.desc: Texas A&M's Myles Patton (2-3, 3.82) has struck out 40 batters and allowed just seven walks over 37.2 innings in seven starts; top-ranked Tennessee, which has split the 24 all-time series vs. the Aggies, has a .317 team batting average in 2025.

programme.title: Equestrian
programme.desc: Equestrian is the only sport staged in the Olympic Games that involves animals, and it is one of the few sports where men and women compete head-to-head; equestrian includes: dressage, jumping and eventing as both rider and horse are challenged.

programme.title: SportsCenter Special
programme.desc: Mel Kiper Jr. reveals the fourth edition of his mock 2025 NFL Draft, going over the changes he made from his third mock, the players that are rising and falling on his board, along with the best fits for teams looking to address needs.

programme.title: Numbers on the Board
programme.desc: Four friends talk all things NBA basketball and provide their unique perspectives, breaking down results from the recent games, the latest news making headlines across the league and rumors making the rounds that could create waves.

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: From 1990-1993, the Buffalo Bills were known as much for their talent as their fighting in the locker room, but the team managed to come together to make a series of memorable Super Bowl runs that all ended in disappointment.

programme.title: MLB Baseball
programme.desc: Roki Sasaki (0-0, 5.79) has worked 4.2 innings over two starts for the Dodgers; Aaron Nola (0-1, 8.44) had eight strikeouts in his last start for the Phillies.

programme.title: MLB Baseball
programme.desc: Roki Sasaki (0-0, 5.79) has worked 4.2 innings over two starts for the Dodgers; Aaron Nola (0-1, 8.44) had eight strikeouts in his last start for the Phillies.

programme.title: 2025 College Basketball Crown
programme.desc: Nebraska (19-14) defeated Georgetown, 81-69, to advance behind 28 points from Brice Williams and 17 from Juwan Gary; Boise State (26-10) erupted on offense to beat Butler, 100-93, behind 27 points from Javan Buchanan and 21 from Tyson Degenhart.

programme.title: NASCAR Cup Series
programme.desc: Denny Hamlin secured his first Cup Series win of 2025 and 55th of his career with a victory at Martinsville over Christopher Bell; Brad Keselowski and Chase Briscoe won the two races at Darlington last year over Ty Gibbs and Kyle Busch.

programme.title: LIV Golf
programme.desc: Players and teams compete in fifth event of 2025 for a $25 million purse; Dean Burmester won the individual crown with a playoff triumph over Sergio Garcia, while Legion XIII took home the team title with a one-shot victory in last year's edition.

programme.title: UFL Football
programme.desc: Defending XFL Conference champion San Antonio (0-1) dropped its opener to Arlington, 33-9; St. Louis (1-0) opened with a 31-6 win over Houston behind two touchdowns from Manny Wilkins, and won both meetings with the Brahmas last season.

programme.title: 2025 College Basketball Crown
programme.desc: UCF (19-16) used a strong second half to beat Cincinnati, 88-80, to advance behind 31 points and seven assists from Darius Johnson; Villanova (21-14) came back to beat USC, 60-59, behind 28 points from the country's leading scorer Eric Dixon.

programme.title: PBA Bowling
programme.desc: The event pushes the world's top players to their physical limits as they race to throw as many strikes as possible in a two-minute window; 2024 champion Jesper Svensson, EJ Tackett, Jason Belmonte, Kris Prather and Ryan Barnes headline the field.

programme.title: MLB on FS1 Postgame
programme.desc: Analysts recap the recent game with highlights and interviews with players and managers, along with looking around the rest of the MLB to update games in progress and show highlights of the completed games to cover the day's action.

programme.title: NASCAR Race Day
programme.desc: RaceDay previews the Goodyear 400 and Denny Hamlin, who secured his first win of the season with his victory at Martinsville over Christopher Bell, going over the latest news from pit road and updated track conditions, along with their predictions.

programme.title: NASCAR Cup Series
